_header: Maid and mother mild / for love of thine child
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — one 6-line stanza (aabccb) at the conclusion of the Aȝenbite

BLAru57.Transcription: MAyde and moder myldeuor loue of þine childeþet if god an manNMe þet am þet am zuo wyldein ani zenne þou me ssyldeAse ich þe bydde can. Amen
